strings.full_screen_description: Wenn deaktiviert wird Sneaksters in einem Fenster laufen.
strings.name: Name
strings.room_code_explanation: Gruppencodes bestehen aus den GROßBUCHSTABEN A-Z.
strings.computer_desc: <color=white>Hacke Türen und warne die Diebe als</color> Auge am Himmel<color=white>!!</color>
strings.thief_desc: Schau dich um und verwende die Hilfen der Augen um Edelsteine zu stehelen als <color=purple>Dieb</color>!
strings.move_faster_without_gem: (Du bewest dich schneller, wenn du nichts trägst.)
strings.confirm_disconnect: Möchtest du dich wirklich die Verbindung zu dieser Gruppe trennen?
strings.photon: **UNTRANSLATED** - Original: 'Powered by Photon PUN by Exit Games'
strings.play_online_desc: **UNTRANSLATED** - Original: 'Embark on missions with other players.'
strings.gem_heist_desc: **UNTRANSLATED** - Original: 'Work together to grab all the Gemstones and escape!'
strings.hide_and_seek_desc: **UNTRANSLATED** - Original: 'Avoid being caught by the Chaser!'
strings.create_a_room_desc: **UNTRANSLATED** - Original: 'Form an online squad for other players to join.'
strings.join_a_room_desc: **UNTRANSLATED** - Original: 'Join an online squad using a four-letter code.'
strings.customize_desc: **UNTRANSLATED** - Original: 'Buy and swap hats to modify your thieving skills.'
strings.discord_rich_presence_description: **UNTRANSLATED** - Original: 'If enabled, users on Discord will be able to see information about your Sneaksters game session.'
strings.online_settings_server_description: **UNTRANSLATED** - Original: 'Note that you must be connected to the same server as another player to play with them.'
strings.online_settings_hidecode_description: **UNTRANSLATED** - Original: 'Hide the Squad Code by default. Useful for when you don't want a lot of people to join a Squad.'
strings.invert_y_mouselook_description: **UNTRANSLATED** - Original: 'When enabled, moving your mouse up causes your view to look down.'
strings.qualitylevel_description: **UNTRANSLATED** - Original: 'A higher quality level will look better, but be more demanding to your computer.'
strings.music_vol_description: **UNTRANSLATED** - Original: 'Set the volume for game music.'
strings.sfx_vol_description: **UNTRANSLATED** - Original: 'Set the volume for in-game sound effects.'
strings.error_connecting: **UNTRANSLATED** - Original: 'The server could not be reached. Please check your Internet connection and try again.'
